attributes.action: Hold MP's claiming excesive amounts accountable for fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's should be charged with fraud, as would be the normal worker if they tried claim excessive amounts from the tax man. It should'nt be a case of just pay the money back they should loose their seat and be charged with deception and fraud. These MP's have been voted in by the trusting people and have laughed in the face of people strugling to survive while they abuse the system.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
